
This command helps you create just an ellar project provided `pyproject.toml` exist in the working directory(`cwd`)

```shell
ellar create-project my_new_project
```

will create a folder as follows:
```angular2html
my_new_project
├── apps
|   └── __init__.py
├── core
├── domain
└── __init__.py
└── config.py
└── root_module.py
└── server.py
```
